definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Fouth, remember pull up the Battery plug after use.
sentences.chinese: 其四，電褥子使用完後要拔掉電源插頭。

sentences.english: Some men brought to him a paralytic, lying on a mat.
sentences.chinese: 有人用褥子擡着一個癱子，到耶穌跟前來。

sentences.english: Get up and take care of your mat.
Jesus heals a man brought on his sleeping mat by four friends.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌醫好一個躺在褥子上由四個朋友擡來的癱子。

sentences.english: On these mattresses they had laid the wounded.
sentences.chinese: 他們讓傷員們躺在那些厚褥子上。

sentences.english: Your mattress and pillow can contribute to better sleep, too.
sentences.chinese: 褥子和枕頭也可以更好幫助睡眠。

sentences.english: And immediately the man was made whole, and took up his bed, and walked: and on the same day was the sabbath.
sentences.chinese: 那人立刻痊癒，就拿起褥子走了。

sentences.english: Then asked they him, What man is that which said unto thee, Take up thy bed, and walk?
sentences.chinese: 他們問他說，對你說拿褥子走的，是什麼人。

definition: kang (a heatable brick bed)/to bake/to dry by the heat of a fire
summer sleeping mat (e.g. of woven split bamboo)/CL:張|张[zhang1],領|领[ling3]
